definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: We discussed the shade and also breaking up the shade with slightly lighter laterals and darker canines.
sentences.chinese: 我們討論了色度但是側切牙的色度淺些，尖牙的深點。

sentences.english: We discussed the shade and also breaking up the shade with slightly lighter laterals and darker canines.
sentences.chinese: 我們討論了色度但是側切牙的色度淺些，尖牙的深點。
該色度計的其中一項讀數是綠色。

sentences.english: X-Rite's first colorimeter was also introduced in 1989.
sentences.chinese: 愛色麗的第一臺色度儀也於1989年問世。

sentences.english: The method of using the BRDF to reproduction the chromaticity of object is feasible.
sentences.chinese: 利用BRDF實現物體色度特性是可行的。

sentences.english: Study was made on transparency and colorimetry of filter membrane with phenyl silicone rubber as main material.
sentences.chinese: 研究了以苯基硅橡膠爲基膠的濾光膜的透光率及色度。

sentences.english: Visual tri-stimulus colorimeters are optical devices .
sentences.chinese: 視覺型三刺激值色度計是一種光學裝置。

sentences.english: This colorimeter reading is for a patch called cyan.
sentences.chinese: 該色度計讀數針對顏色爲青色的一片。
該色度計的其中一項讀數是藍色。

sentences.english: VID_TYPE_CHROMAKEY: Chromakey can be used to select which parts of the image to display.
sentences.chinese: 色度鍵控可以選擇顯示圖像的那一部分。

sentences.english: None of the colors were deep, they were the lightest shades.
sentences.chinese: 這些色彩無一深濃，全是最淺的色度。

sentences.english: The estimation of the chromaticity of the incident light is calculated on the chromaticity plane.
sentences.chinese: 然後通過在色度平面上的分析，估計入射光的色度值。

sentences.english: The estimation of the chromaticity of the incident light is calculated on the chromaticity plane.
sentences.chinese: 然後通過在色度平面上的分析，估計入射光的色度值。

sentences.english: I would like to go two shades lighter.
Color information is also called chrominance.
sentences.chinese: 色彩信息也被稱爲色度。

sentences.english: Chroma prediction modes are practically identical as well.
sentences.chinese: 色度預測模式也幾乎相同。
